title: Apple courgette muffins
ingredients: ['250g caster sugar', '160ml vegetable oil', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '280g plain flour', '1 1/2 tablespoons ground cinnamon, or more to taste', '3/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon baking powder', '250g grated courgette', '125g grated apple']
